docs.snippet: Mr. Rudas took classical music from concert halls to casinos and from there to baseball stadiums and the Eiffel Tower....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Rudas took classical music from concert halls to casinos and from there to baseball stadiums and the Eiffel Tower.
docs.abstract: Tibor Rudas, an irrepressible impresario who took classical music from concert halls to unusual venues, including baseball stadiums and the Eiffel Tower, helping to propel the Three Tenors to global glory, dies at age 94.

headline.main: Tibor Rudas Dies at 94; Brought the World the Three Tenors
headline.print_headline: Tibor Rudas, Classical Music Impresario, Dies at 94

docs.snippet: The musical “Bull Durham,” adapted from the 1988 movie and making its premiere at the Alliance Theater in Atlanta, feels more formulaic than inspired....
docs.lead_paragraph: The musical “Bull Durham,” adapted from the 1988 movie and making its premiere at the Alliance Theater in Atlanta, feels more formulaic than inspired.
docs.abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews musical Bull Durham, with book by Ron Shelton and score by Susan Werner, at the Alliance Theater in Atlanta; Kip Fagan directs and John Behlmann, Will Swenson and Melissa Errico star; musical is based on 1988 movie written and directed by Shelton.

headline.seo: ‘Bull Durham,’ a Musical Adaptation of the 1988 Movie
